chooseEquipment.text: Click on the Random Table link to get money before continuing

message.text: You may take up to five of the following (all meals count as one object):
Drop one Backpack Item or Weapon in lieu of payment for a night in the dormitory
If you agree to his proposal, drop 2 Special Items or 20 Gold Crowns
If you agree to his proposal, drop 2 Special Items or 20 Gold Crowns

numberPicker.text: Choose the number of Gold Crowns you want to donate
Choose the number of Gold Crowns you want to bet
